description:
Tama, the robot maid, has started to work at the Otose Snack House. She helps by collecting rent from Gintoki and the others. Otose appreciates the fact that she works hard without any rest and decides to give her three days off. But as a maid, Tama only knows how to work for other people. She doesn`t know how she should spend her break. Gintoki decides to take Tama out for some fun, but…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Birthday in Your Twenties Has No Deep Meaning / You`re Lucky If You Can Stay Up Late to Work
Nijuudai no Tanjoubi ni Fukai Imi wa Nai / Okite Hataraku Kahou Mono
二十代の誕生日に深い意味はない / 起きて働く果報者
